website_summaries.verdict: Although it's a good budget-price gaming rig, the Alienware Alpha isn't the Steam Machine you've been waiting for.
cons: Loading games is more difficult than on a gaming console

customer_reviews.title: Better than I hoped
customer_reviews.text: great machine. I am very happy. and I've yet to find a game that won't play at ultra or very high. unless you're looking for constant 60fps. for me I prefer smoother graphics than smoother frame rate (as long as it doesn't stutter I'm fine). I have yet to find something that it won't play. I'm sure I will at some point. but for the price I'm stunned at how good it is. I did maxout the ram and may put an ssd in it as some point but really it's all about the graphics card. it's quite good. I would upgrade the ram at the very least though.
customer_reviews.author: RK3^...

customer_reviews.title: Great!!! but MUST upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. Looks awesome. However, you MUST upgrade this machine in order to really use it for gaming or everyday computing. 1) Add the 8 gb ram in there. I bought an 8 gb ram and just plugged it in, now reading 12 GB (overkill) ~Takes 2-3 mins. 2) MUST ADD Solid State Drive<<<<< from couple of mins start up to 2-3 seconds. (yes, that much faster) ~10-15 mins with all setup including the creation of the backup data for formatting of the SSD.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: This is such a tiny powerful gaming computer.I have seen a lot of videos about it and when I had the Alpha on my hands I could not believe how small it was. The initial setup was easy. I synchronized my Steam account and I started to download some of my games. I played Ridge Racer Unbounded and it was really good with the graphics. From Steam you can access Youtube so that was really cool. One of the best features of this Alienware Alpha is its size, there is no way you can build such a small computer that can pack all this one has. 100% recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Zuñiga

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price at base, amazing with upgrades.
customer_reviews.text: Loving this little thing. Super quiet, sleek, and a great buy. The whole i3 vs i5 vs i7 difference is pretty much throwing your money away. Little to no recorded difference between the 3 and you can use the money that you save from getting the i7 to upgrading the i3 base. Currently upgraded to a 120gb ssd and am using a 1tb hdd through an enclosure and again, it's super quiet. In process of upgrading ram to 16 gbs. 400 for pc (amazon), 100 for ssd & hdd and enclosure (best buy), 70 for ram (amazon) = $570 for a fast, small, quiet pc.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Maybe if it was like $100? Died quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted for 1.5 years. Would not recommend. I got one since my husband had one and it ran decently and is relatively small. His freezes when he tries to play LoL. Mine got the yellow light. Tried replacing the inner piece and reset. Didn't work. NOT WORTH THE PRICE. It won't last long!
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Solid computer, almost made it 5 years.
customer_reviews.text: Well it made it 3 months shy of 5 total years, and this computer has served me well. After taking a small drop to the carpet, it first did the blinky yellow light thing, and now nothing at all when I press the power button. I've tinkered with it and it appears to have finally met its end.
customer_reviews.author: John ¥

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Dose all that I need it too... But I would recommend getting the i5 or i7 the ram can be upgrade, and if you want to play games like GTA, Fallout 4, Skyrim remaster or newer games then buy the graphics AMP along with it. It's great but I think calling it a "Console killer" is a bit of a overstatement, being that you can't upgrade the graphics card beyond buying a graphics AMP and that there is no headphone jack and that you have to buy a special converter from HDMI to VGA to use a monitor, but for light gamer or the person new to PC gaming it's great but definitely not a console killer.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: This plays any game at 60 fps on medium quality. Plays most games at ultra at at least 30 40 fps. I'm upset about the lack of headphone port. But you can buy a adpater. It's a good idea to buy a steam controller too. It comes with an Xbox controller. But I steam controller allows you to control the whole PC from your bed laying down. I did have to upgrade the RAM to 8 gb though
customer_reviews.author: Mason M.

customer_reviews.title: ... 2016 and for the first two years it worked fine. Then in 2018 it begin displaying a yellow ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this computer in 2016 and for the first two years it worked fine. Then in 2018 it begin displaying a yellow flashing light whenever I tried to turn it on. Did lots of research on solutions and although a few worked temporarily the computer ultimately refused to turn on it just continued flashing a yellow light. This is a common defect in these machines and is most likely the motherboard, buy it at your own risk, these computers should be recalled!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck gaming computer.
customer_reviews.text: The alienware alpha performs well, for what it is- a cheapish game console that is also a windows machine. I have stopped using the alpha in console mode, because the console ui sucks, and leads to confusion. When you run steam inside the console mode, it is nice, but it is easier to run steam through windows. Gameplay is good. Skyrim with mods at high settings, rocket league (WOO!), and all sorts of other games you can't get for most consoles, run well, and usually on high settings. I upgraded to 8gb of ram from the get go, so ymmv.
customer_reviews.author: matthew lynch

customer_reviews.title: It's cool!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for the kids and I have to admit I want one too. Been building PCs since the 1990s and I still would love to adopt the simplicity of this clean little gamer. If you can build this cheaper, not by much, I know the specs, I've priced. Finally an affordable Alienware. Oh, I did have to call tech support for something and they were great. No idea why all the other complaints about them. Prolly just too demanding?
customer_reviews.author: Hurting

customer_reviews.title: Love this as a laptop alternative
customer_reviews.text: I love this little system! I bought the i3 and added ram later and it ran great! I was getting 250+ FPS on LoL and around 60 on WoW. I travel a lot and this thing was perfect. I plugged it in via HDMI at hotel rooms and other locations and with wi-fi and I never had to lug a monitor. I cant say enough about how great the size is. I recommend buying the cheap i3 as a laptop alternative. Its light, durable, and plugging in to any HDMI means, you can use it anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: disgustipated

customer_reviews.title: I don't find building much fun anymore so I chose this as my new gaming ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been PC gaming for years and have always built my own PC Gaming system. At this point in my life, I don't find building much fun anymore so I chose this as my new gaming system. It was a wise choice. I love that steam (and other online) gaming services are built-in to the Steam OS interface. I also like that I can switch to Windows 10 desktop mode if need be. The gaming is smooth and can handle very high frame rates on the newest games. I'm playing COD Black OPS 3 now and have not had a problem yet.
customer_reviews.author: ER

customer_reviews.title: This is a really good computer. Though I would highly recommend to upgrade ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good computer. Though I would highly recommend to upgrade it right out of the box! I purchased base i3 model not so long ago for 399. Out of the box it seemed a little slow to boot and open heavy apps. So I maxed memory to 16GB and put 250 GB Samsung 850 evo. With these updates it boots in seconds, and handle all my tasks easily: be it web surfing, photo editing, programming, or light gaming. In fact I'm able to play Metro 2033 at 1080, high settings with no lags at all (I had to turn off PhysX though).
customer_reviews.author: S and T

customer_reviews.title: The Alienware alpha is a great small form factor PC with limited upgrade-ability
customer_reviews.text: The Alienware alpha is a great small form factor PC with limited upgrade-ability. as far as dell products go for the price you get a hard working little PC. ideal for those looking for a HTPC or small gaming PC with a couch focused living room experience. Upgrading the Ram is suggested and as easy as it can be, similar to the experience you encounter upgrading a laptop's RAM. I also recommend upgrading your hard drive to a SSD for faster boot and performance. All in all I recommend the Alienware Alpha
customer_reviews.author: BrandonPonYoutube

customer_reviews.title: so my expectations were pretty low going into it
customer_reviews.text: I'm thoroughly impressed with this PC! I knew it had a relatively under powered GPU due to its size, so my expectations were pretty low going into it. However, it performs so much better than I thought it would. I haven't played many gigantic big-budget games, but Dishonored for example plays at a perfectly smooth 60fps at 1080p with everything maxed out. Every 2D game I throw at it runs easily. I love the form factor too. For the price, I'm really really happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: J. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: This little machine is still amazing in 2018
customer_reviews.text: With World of Warcraft and Guildwars 2, I was playing all ULTRA getting a average of 70 fps. This little machine is still amazing in 2018, I squeezed out some better performance buy swapping the HDD for an SSD and added an additional 4 gigs of memory.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Anthony Martinez

customer_reviews.title: ... little more ram and an SSD made this a brilliant little PC
customer_reviews.text: A little more ram and an SSD made this a brilliant little PC. used it as my main PC at home for a full year before I started running into games I couldn't play well on it. Overall, I great little PC. definitely worth a consideration as a media PC for your home entertainment needs or a powerful little gaming PC for your living room. Steam Streaming off a more beefy gaming PC also makes this a great extension to your PC gaming needs. Runs DOOM (2016) at 720p on high at 42FPS, rather incredible if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Dawoud

customer_reviews.title: Do not over look this system, this may be the best system Dell ever made.
customer_reviews.text: This system highly under rated, it can handle every game I want to play on high or very high easy with no frame rate loss. I have upgraded to 16GB of ram, changed out the hard drive for 750GB 7200RPM Western Digital Black drive, later I plan to upgrade the CPU. I use it in desktop mode 99% of the time, I would recommend the Alpha to anyone that wants a great system that takes up very little room.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great little system
customer_reviews.text: For the size and price, the alpha is amazing. I love having my gaming pc tucked away under my tv. Games play great in 1080p, and pc games are so much cheaper than Console games, especially with steam sales and bundles. I would also recommend installing shairport4w and turning the alpha into an airport destination (for those who have Apple devices).
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Lalic

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It's a great item, it's a PC but is meant to be played as a console, that is why it's not the best at gaming but it is pretty dang good, I haven't had a single problem with any games yet except for battlefield 4 but that is because I got the 4gb ram base model, I bought more ram that is coming tomorrow and then bf4 should work like a charm, I put all my games in high and ultra settings and get above 40fps easy even passed 60fps on a lot of games. I recommend if you're looking for just a little side PC you can bring places easy
customer_reviews.author: Mark22

customer_reviews.title: I mean its what i paid for
customer_reviews.text: 2 GB of ram is not nearly enough, i would probably raise this to 4-5 stars if they had a cheap 4GB RAM option but 2 GB is barely enough to run google chrome. 2GB of RAM is like nothing even when I bought it. do yourself a favor and buy the i5 version with 4 or 8 GB of RAM.
customer_reviews.author: David Ekstrom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cheap computer
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this and very happy about it. I am using it for a media center/movie hub. I highly recommend what everyone else is saying and buy an extra 4GB stick of memory (it's only $20) and a solid state ($77). Out of the box it's pretty slow but once you upgrade it which is super easy it's blazing fast! Windows 10 upgrade also comes with it too for free. Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: JPG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for our family.
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this. We don't console game a lot, but this has made us do it a lot more. Getting games from Steam is SO much cheaper. I highly recommend this for anyone who likes Steam or who wants to get games on HUGE sales.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLover

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming PC for the price
customer_reviews.text: This PC continues to surprise me. As someone who normally builds my own budget to mid-level gaming PCs, I was a bit hesitant at first because of the mobile GPU and the i3 processor, but the CPU and GPU both keep up well. Games look great at 1080. I upgraded the RAM and replaced the hard drive with an SSD. Boots to desktop in about 3 seconds after power on with my setup. The other thing is, this PC is tiny. Generally, it is slightly larger than a Nintendo Wii. If you're a console gamer that wants to get in to PC gaming, this is the box for you. If you're a budget builder, this may be for you, too.
customer_reviews.author: David Flick

customer_reviews.title: I was originally going to replace this product as it ...
customer_reviews.text: I was originally going to replace this product as it got stuck in the Windows 8 repair loop out of the box. I was able to get it booted and do a fresh install of Windows 10. It has worked flawlessly ever since. I upgraded the ram to 8 gb and am able to play everything that i want. The whole reason I bought it was to play older games that Steam offers that you cannot get on PS4 or XBONE. I have not tried to run anything relatively new on the Alpha yet as I use my consoles for newer titles.
customer_reviews.author: jreese

customer_reviews.title: This was a solid purchase. I upgraded the ram ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a solid purchase. I upgraded the ram and hdd to an ssd, I believe these are necessary purchases for this computer. I used it solely as a desktop and found a few annoyances such as not giving me admin rights/having to change user accounts and having to tweak things here and there in desktop mode.
customer_reviews.author: Sean114

customer_reviews.title: I originally bought this to use with my tv and ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to use with my tv and lazy boy chair but soon after I gave up trying to use a keyboard and mouse on my lap/armrest and decided to set it up as a desktop on a desk. I now use it for everything. Only issues are the graphic card limitations. I also bought the lower ram version as I had ram laying around I planned on using but have yet too. Every once in a while I notice it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.text: If you're on the fence about this system, do yourself a favor and buy it now. Just bought the i3, and it's a very solid gaming system. If you're a fan of the total war series, this console runs them very smoothly (30-40) fps on ultra graphics setting. Dirt 3, civ 5, and many others I've tried play great. Still need to try xcom 2, which I'm sure will test it more, but to this point I'm impressed with how quiet the system is. Bottom line, if you're a console player at heart, but like in-depth strategy games only found pc, this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Hunters

customer_reviews.title: This thing is the best you are going to get without blowing tons of ...
customer_reviews.text: needed a decent gaming computer at a low price. This thing is the best you are going to get without blowing tons of money. Their newer versions (obviously) are much better but also 3X the cost. Runs many current games very smoothly, console mode supposedly makes games run even smoother but have not needed to switch over to find out : )
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin P. Stubbs

customer_reviews.title: It's not the size that matters.
customer_reviews.text: I'll be damned if this isn't a fun little box. It's definitely on the pricey side for a person on a budget but oh boy do you get a long of bang for your buck. Browsing and normal computer work is a breeze and the gaming is a blast. I would count myself as a filthy casual and not by any means a hardcore gamer like when I was younger but it's a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Working great and playing with fun.
customer_reviews.text: I love this device.Save my space but run fast and steady. I used to gaming on my laptop,now I'm always playing with my Alienware machine.It makes my laptop as a clumsy toy. In the beginning,I installed Windows 7,it worked great and after updating Windows 10 recently,I'm playing well,through sometimes it may have compatible problems.I'm glad The machine's performance till now.
customer_reviews.author: leo

customer_reviews.title: While it isn't the greatest hardware innovation in PC/console gaming
customer_reviews.text: While it isn't the greatest hardware innovation in PC/console gaming, this thing gets the job done. I especially recommend upgrading the ram to 8gb and then installing an SSD (unreal how much faster loading times are post SSD installation). PC performance is exactly what I expected, no more no less. I'm not part of the master race nor do I have the time to make my own computer. Besides this thing isn't an eyesore and I can take it anywhere with its small form size.
customer_reviews.author: Avery J Kiser

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pissed about it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in confidence that they would at least call it new and take the old accounts off of it right? 😂 re installed the os, nothing has worked on it since.. then! Video stopped showing so it turns on.. and nothing comes on the screen checked all my HDMI connections, even works with the other devices I have. Pretty pissed about it.
customer_reviews.author: Zane S.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I gotta say this is my first gaming PC I had ever own. The Alienware UI however is something I dislike very much. I was never a fan of Kodi, so ideally Hivemind was not going to work out for me. Also I fixed it so now when the Alpha boots up it goes straight to desktop mode instead of the UI. I like this for school and casual gaming. U can also upgrade over time and is a pretty good buy for the money. Only four star for the UI I didn't like, but that's just me.
customer_reviews.author: Emanuel

customer_reviews.title: awesome computer at an awesome price
customer_reviews.text: Bought a whole bunch of these computers and they work really well. Windows is included so this is one of the cheapest gaming computer out there and from a great brand known for gaming. Note: probably not what you are looking for if you are playing a super graphics intense game but for Kinect-based games, this works super well.
customer_reviews.author: MTL-DAN

customer_reviews.title: It's good, just don't expect top of the line
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this for a little over a year. I upgraded to a ssd, 8gb of ram and a fresh install of Windows right away and it is a great daily use computer. All the extra crap isn't needed. Plays Fallout 4 at high settings at 30-40fps. It is a good cheap PC.
customer_reviews.author: C&T

customer_reviews.title: The Best Mini Gaming PC!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little machine that can take all the games you want to play in your steam library. This is a pc with a costumized Nvidia GTX 860m with a slight overclock giving your games good high setting to ultra.I have the base model withought any updgrades (i3 version) and it works like a charm being able to replace my old laptop from 2012.I recommend this pc for any person who is starting into the pc gaming.Overall no problems and i love my alienware alpha.
customer_reviews.author: Elias B.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: Xmas present for a 10 year old. - I bought an extra 4gb memory and a 250gb solid state drive to go with it, installed it myself, very easy. I would recommend looking up an installation video on youtube. 10 year old is over the moon happy. Its fast, graphics are great. I like that it also runs windows 10 & Office, no more borrowing my laptop to do school reports/projects.
customer_reviews.author: Reagan Moore Jr

customer_reviews.title: A great gaming PC at an affordable cost.
customer_reviews.text: I love my Alpha. I use it mainly for Steam games, and it runs them perfectly. I haven't experienced an issue with a single game. Highly recommend for a PC gamer on a tight budget. Definitely recommend upgrading the RAM though, it doesn't do well at multitasking with the 4 gigs included.
customer_reviews.author: Devin P

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: I've had my alienware since December (now February) and I love it. It's the first PC I've owned and I haven't touched my Xbox since this arrived in the mail. It plays everything flawlessly. I mostly play Smite and Xcom 1 and 2, I know they're not that demanding but compared to all my friends set up, mine looks the best in terms of graphics. The only game I had problems with was H1Z1 but a stick of 4gb ram DDR3L for $15 took care of that. Easily installed and all you need is a screwdriver and YouTube. Highly reccomend it. UPDATE. Its April 2020 and I STILL USE THIS PC DAILY
customer_reviews.author: Gudiel Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Yes i would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a few months now and am very happy with purchase. Is it a full desktop pc? Yes! Is it a gaming console? Sort of. I inteded it to be a media center pc for living room which it is to my complete satisfaction but I've also started enjoying pc gaming again on it, wether through attached wireless keyboard and mouse or included controller (awesome idea). I did buy additional 4 gig memory at time of purchase, also use program called windows shell which was recommended by other reviewer to give the windows 7 desktop feel. Overall it has exceeded my expectations in performance, functionality and cool factor
customer_reviews.author: Dave A

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, I literally dare you to build a ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, I literally dare you to build a equal/better PC for this cheap While the product comes with Windows 8 installed, I'd recommend updating to Windows 10 which you can still do for free on this computer through the assistive technology program
customer_reviews.author: Tavo

customer_reviews.title: Great budget mini pc
customer_reviews.text: I don't generally write reviews, but this product is fantastic. I was looking for a budget mini gaming pc and this exceeded my expectations. I've been able to play dying light, crysis 3, rage, as well as other games with very few problems. Some games will require you to tweak the settings, but most games can play at least at medium settings. If you get this definitely run at 720p. It runs on 1080p, but the graphics can be set higher and everything, including the desktop, runs better on 720p and still looks great. This is a good entry level gaming pc product, and runs very well. Definitely upgrade to a solid state drive though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little beast of a machine.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome device so far. I bought the stock base model. Upgraded ram to 8Gb and added 240 Gb ssd drive. Super fast in everything and all my games play well. Most games are medium to high settings for everything. This little machine keeps up with stable fps on everything I have tried. Definitely recommend the base model with a ram and ssd upgrade. I love the small size and power.
customer_reviews.author: dstanley

customer_reviews.title: but as a windows user I'm glad I got this instead
customer_reviews.text: Was considering a Mac mini, but as a windows user I'm glad I got this instead. Read a lot of reviews before I bought mine (i3) just after Black Friday 2015 for about $380. Picked up a wireless keyboard, some 32 gig flash drives, 16gigs of ram and a 250 gig ssd. Installed new compnents upon arrival, updated to windows 10 with no issues. Absolutely no complaints so far, great price for a gaming console and primarily what I needed, a new pc.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Abibula

customer_reviews.title: This computer is amazing. We hook it up to the TV and ...
customer_reviews.text: This computer is amazing. We hook it up to the TV and use it for games, and it is very easy to hook up and use. So glad we went for this instead of a second gaming laptop.
customer_reviews.author: EmTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Loved it. The upgrade to windows 10 was not ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. The upgrade to windows 10 was not as easy as i would have liked. Played far cry high-ultra settings with a ram upgrade. I updated the hivemind app today and the USB ports stopped working. Dell told me nothing I can do but exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Evans

customer_reviews.title: Small, quiet, good gaming performance, terrible hard drive
customer_reviews.text: I bought the base model. It's small. It plays games good. I love it. The hard drive is painfully, painfully slow. Be prepared to wait minutes alt-tabbing into Chrome, loading a JPG, or god forbid if you touch the filesystem while Dropbox is syncing in the background. It's a 5200RPM Toshiba MQ01ABF050 I just bought a 1TB Samsung 850 EVO SSD. I'll update when it arrives. Runs beautifully on Ultra: Alien: Isolation Saints Row IV The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim anything on the Source engine hundreds of indie games Runs smoothly, but not at Ultra Sleeping Dogs: Definitive Edition Essentially unplayable due to load time League of Legends Unplayable due to HDD stuttering Metro 2033 Redux Metro Last Light Redux
customer_reviews.author: asdf

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GAMING & COMPUTER CONSOLE
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 11 year old son for Christmas. He loves it!! I find myself using the computer part. Good little compact gaming & computer console. His games never freeze, it looks really good on our big screen!! Only thing we noticed it don't have a cd thingy, but no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Love these pc's
customer_reviews.text: Love these pc's. They work as advertised and keep my kids busy with school work. Good solid construction. No pc issues thus far. Have had them for almost a year. Great powerhouse PC!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: they both still love
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for both of my sons. Two years later ,they both still love it
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: Really good starter PC/Console
customer_reviews.text: Really good starter PC/Console. I use it mostly as a PC because I am more of a RTS gamer and it runs amazing! After almost a year - still running and playing games great. Only complaint is the lag spikes I get from playing league of legends... I can't figure out why.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Great machine.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Strongly urge you to upgrade ram and hard drive which is very easy. For the price cannot go wrong. Work with World of Warcraft just fine (high settings).
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: desktop mode works great and just about a solid choice for those wanting ...
customer_reviews.text: i'm absolutely loving my alpha. it can run skyrim at max settings (save for anti-aliasing) as well as added texture upgrades. desktop mode works great and just about a solid choice for those wanting a nice pre-built PC to get their feet wet. love it. (just a side note, you're gonna want to get some additional ram, because larger games like GTAV won't run on 4 GB alone)
customer_reviews.author: eam1188

customer_reviews.title: Great home PC
customer_reviews.text: Great home PC. Just add another 8GB of RAM and change out the 5400RPM drive for SSD and this machine is great!. The license of MS Windows 8 that came with the machine allowed me to update to Windows 10 Pro. Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Great value: both a games console and a PC
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for his birthday. Really great value because it serves as either a games console or a PC. He likes it a lot and it's well-integrated with Steam, so he's playing all his favorite games.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: I liked the computer
customer_reviews.text: I liked the computer. Not noisy and the interface and size, however even after buying a USB router, it still wouldn't allow me to connect to my internet network on wifi :(
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Love my alpha
customer_reviews.text: Love my alpha , no game that I can't play so far in 1080p,( NBA 2k16, Assassin s creed syndicate, mortal kombat X) definitely invest in 8gb of memory and a bigger hard drive
customer_reviews.author: Deirkson Maduro

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the performance for the price
customer_reviews.text: Its more functional, powerful, and smaller then the Xbox One or PS4. When I bought mine it was cheaper then either game console as well. Now if only Microsoft would combine the Xbox with their Windows software and allow the games to be backwards compatible.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: The whole AlphaUI looks nice, but is way too heavy
customer_reviews.text: The whole AlphaUI looks nice, but is way too heavy, made the whole computer run slower (even chrome). Removing it was the best thing I ever did.
customer_reviews.author: dudu sig

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend this as a good alternative gaming console...
customer_reviews.text: Constant crashes and game freezes even with the upgraded 8 Gig memory. The UI is not as seamless as I would like...it's very complicated and clunky! Has potential though...
customer_reviews.author: Dre' Dragos

customer_reviews.title: while not the most powerful of PC's it a great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: while not the most powerful of PC's it a great bang for your buck. I purchased this as a guest computer and my niece loves playing the forest on High Quality. I would recommend adding 4gb of ram for smoother gaming. Would recommend to anyone wanting an inexpensive gaming pc.
customer_reviews.author: Hagen

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great portable pc that can also play games. Using it right now to write this review. Will upgrade proccesor when I can find a Intel I5 on sale. Great buy of 2015 for me.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beginning gamer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the beginning gamer! Easy set up, wireless connectivity, uses controller as well as key board and mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Still playing with it. But in reality its a ...
customer_reviews.text: Still playing with it. But in reality its a windows 8 machine running an alienware interface for gaming. Not all steam games use the xbox controller.
customer_reviews.author: Ldcarson

customer_reviews.title: Good little  PC
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for use with Zwift and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Returned the item and went for desktop one. Processor speed is bit slow compared to desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great small computer
customer_reviews.text: Great small computer. I use it for my camera server at my house. The i7 would be even cooler/faster! Setup was easy. Cool factor is off the charts!
customer_reviews.author: TheReviewITGuy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice computer. Period.
customer_reviews.text: Hard drive is a lot faster than I thought. Extremely good computer, and can even handle video editing (Hitfilm4 Express) and light 3D rendering (Blender) extremely well. One issue with this computer is that certain games occasionally crash. This has resulted in getting me a 7 day ban on CSGO :(.
customer_reviews.author: Keita Tsutsumi

customer_reviews.title: 1st it is a great gaming system in game mode with Steam built in
customer_reviews.text: 1st it is a great gaming system in game mode with Steam built in. As far as a PC it is all so good once you get rid of all the crap it trys to trick you in to downloading ..
customer_reviews.author: zaps40

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good 👌
customer_reviews.text: It's good as and cheap on amazon but, because it's not upgradable, it's just an all around better idea to build it yourself, especially with the launch of AMDs 480. I also had a problem with the UI a few months ago where the quit to desktop option was totally removed and I was stuck but I found a thing in the files to switch it back to desktop and I just never used the UI ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Maisie

customer_reviews.title: Great machine. I know I wasn't buying the top ...
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. I know I wasn't buying the top of the line gaming machine, but for a nice compact PC, this has served me perfectly. I swapped the hard drive with a SSD and it runs every game I have tried so far just fine.
customer_reviews.author: J. C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for $189 on Amazon. Glitch?
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for $189, Amazon glitch? but it's sweet. Plays COD BOIII, Fallout 4 and Skyrim no problem. Had to upgrade RAM to 16gb but easy. Should be good for a while.
customer_reviews.author: rhino11us

customer_reviews.title: Great for console gamers that wanna play PC games at ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for console gamers that wanna play PC games at medium to high graphics settings. Good Christmas idea for kids that aren't quite ready for a PC
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Great machine to use with your TV
customer_reviews.text: Great machine to use with your TV. I've been using this with Steam and I love it. Also, the very surprising part of this is how well it runs most of the games I own with just an i3. I think it could use a little more RAM and Disk space, but these can be easily upgraded. I guess I didn't read the description well enough, but I was also pleasantly surprised to get an HDMI cable, ethernet cable and wireless XBox controller. Very great little machine even as a HTPC, it does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: Z. Tippett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome PC
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a PC and it rocks; solid speed without upgrades and 0 drama. I have it hooked to a 27 UHD monitor and it's even better than a Mac Mini.
customer_reviews.author: BruceWayne305

customer_reviews.title: Fine little computer
customer_reviews.text: Fine little computer, small and quiet, but does not get too hot. The fun color customization is a nice touch. My only gripe is that it only had 4 gigs, which made the computer lag a little bit, if you were to get this I 100% recommend 8 gigs of ram.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great console and mini-PC after throwing in some upgrades like RAM and SSD.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted mini-PC with good video card so I can occasionally play few modern games and having upgrade options, cause good PCs are all about options. The item fits my goals neatly. You can use any Haswell CPU (not just T models, but also S and plain) and SATA SSD drives, any DDR3L ram available on the market. The cooling system is pretty quiet and effective and you can also play a bit with Intel XTU software to undervolt CPU.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small PC plays all modern games at good-to-great settings!
customer_reviews.text: Plays all non-VR games at 30+fps, 1080p, medium+ settings. Extremely tiny PC which is what I need in my small apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I would rate this 5/5 in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this to any new people want a good gaming PC. It runs CS:GO, Heros and generals, and ARK survival all on high(I would prefer to run ARK on medium). It's very easy to set up and install a new memory card or storage. One more thing is BUY another 4 GB(ram) card to upgrade this to a 8GB, Recommend- Kingston Technology 4GB... Kingston Technology
customer_reviews.author: Gahjay

customer_reviews.title: Great console added 8 more gig of RAM and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great console added 8 more gig of RAM and it was easy as pie got a awesome computer for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought for my son for Christmas, he loves it. Aliienware quality in a small package
customer_reviews.author: Trae Prather

customer_reviews.title: Use in pc mode upgrade ram.
customer_reviews.text: Upgrade the Ram. I have 6 now will do 16. I only use it in pc mode makes everything easier.
customer_reviews.author: Charzard

customer_reviews.title: Two in one power!
customer_reviews.text: Functioned as expected. Ran dragons dogma and metro last light on the highest quality settings. I love the easy accessibility to windows 8 (have not installed windows 10 yet) and how in under a minute I can go from game to desktop computer. I'd recommend this product to anyone looking for a gaming console as well as anyone looking for a desktop!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy so far
customer_reviews.text: I use this small computer for playing steam games. Upgraded it with 4 GB RAM. Works perfectly with the XBOX 360 (comes with the console) und Steam controllers. Great buy so far!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas St.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great for the person who doesn't need a giant gaming counsle
customer_reviews.author: Jacob R.

customer_reviews.title: Great system for entry to PC gaming
customer_reviews.text: I got this last year, and it hasn't let me down yet. You'll need to upgrade the RAM, but when that's done it'll run even current games on medium, or high graphics with a good frame rate. I definitely recommend it for people looking for a small, decent gaming PC, but don't wanna dish out too much money.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Braun

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Didnt even last 2 years before it quit taking updates
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: I recommend upgrading to 8gb of ram ans swapping hdd for ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding device for it's price. Very, very capable !! Although, I recommend upgrading to 8gb of ram ans swapping hdd for sdd
customer_reviews.author: ArK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good deal, $389 from $550. I couldn't resist it. beside came with 6 games from steam
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Loran

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and fast gaming pc
customer_reviews.text: Great gaming computer. Was going to get a ps4 but decided that PC gaming was the way to go. For the price it's unbeatable. Just upgrade the measly 4gb of RAM to 8 and it will run anything you throw at it
customer_reviews.author: Russell B.

customer_reviews.title: It's quite a good deal. I got it today and am happy ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a base i3 model for 389$ before tax. It's quite a good deal. I got it today and am happy with it. Did the ram upgrade to 8gb and add an ssd then the little machine became a powerful one. happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Vic Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Very good machine.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good. Open for easy memory and disk upgrade. Best choice for cheapest gaming machine.
customer_reviews.author: Petr

customer_reviews.title: ... its ok can run some of the newer titles pretty well especially for about
customer_reviews.text: eh its ok can run some of the newer titles pretty well especially for about 500
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, portable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, portable, and fast with additional memory. Works great for games and as a portable desktop. Some issues with Alpha UI working with Steam after upgrading to Windows 10.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Soudachanh

customer_reviews.title: If I had to describe this PC in two words: Alienware Rocks.
customer_reviews.text: This machine just blows everything else away. It purrs like a kitten, even when playing some of the most demanding games in my library.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome. Upgraded ram right away and I can play ...
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome. Upgraded ram right away and I can play most of my games on max.
customer_reviews.author: David Schultz

customer_reviews.title: PC gaming on steroids
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! True high definition on my tv, able to see so much more than before on my laptop. So easy to use and take on the road and hook up anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: victorsalazar

customer_reviews.title: good price for good product
customer_reviews.text: Very fast after upgrade to SSD and 8GB MEM, good price for good product.
customer_reviews.author: Z.L
